line.comment: * $journal is an array, $journalMission is a table.

line.text: 'This will permanently clear your journal, are you sure?'
'click here to review the mandalorian offer'
'- low intensity war. Everyone only uses small fleets.'
'- Republic Battlegroups are especially weak in this phase'
'- the galaxy can only change a lot once you actually build an empire'
'- factions are slowly building up much stronger fleets (usually takes 1-2 days)'
'- the Cartell still forbids any major faction to conquer more than half of the galaxy'
'- Mandalorians and Republic have the best fleet production in this phase'
'- all effects will end once you own 20 sectors or complete the Terraforming quest'
'- Galactic Empire and New Republic have the best fleets and production'
'- Republic and Rebel Alliance will slowly go extinct'

line.comment: * add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text=$t return value=null

sval.val: This will permanently clear your journal, are you sure?
click here to review the mandalorian offer
- low intensity war. Everyone only uses small fleets.
- Republic Battlegroups are especially weak in this phase
- the galaxy can only change a lot once you actually build an empire
- factions are slowly building up much stronger fleets (usually takes 1-2 days)
- the Cartell still forbids any major faction to conquer more than half of the galaxy
- Mandalorians and Republic have the best fleet production in this phase
- all effects will end once you own 20 sectors or complete the Terraforming quest
- Galactic Empire and New Republic have the best fleets and production
- Republic and Rebel Alliance will slowly go extinct
$journal is an array, $journalMission is a table.
add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text=$t return value=null
